mapper.select:
select
from CMS_SITE S where S.IsDelete = 0 order by S.Sequence asc

select
, CU.UserName as createUserName, UU.UserName as updateUserName from ( select distinct
from CMS_SITE S join CMS_SITE_ROLE SR on S.SiteID = SR.SiteID and SR.RoleID and S.IsDelete = 0 and SR.IsDelete = 0 in #{item.roleID} ) S left outer join CORE_SECURITY_USER CU on S.CreateUser = CU.UserID and CU.IsDelete = 0 left outer join CORE_SECURITY_USER UU on S.UpdateUser = UU.UserID and UU.IsDelete = 0 order by S.Sequence asc

select
from CMS_SITE S where S.SiteCode = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and S.IsDelete = 0
